mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.prj_code AS "prjCode", a.prj_name AS "prjName", a.approve_num AS "approveNum", a.approve_date AS "approveDate", a.address AS "address", a.county_num AS "countyNum", a.lcid AS "lcid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.display_flag AS "displayFlag", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
